meanings.definition: Reflects or deflects radiation or particles in a backward direction.
meanings.sent1: The mirror backscatters the light towards the wall.
meanings.sent2: The radar backscatters the signal off the aircraft.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous cat backscatters the laser pointer beam all over the room.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter backscatters joy in every corner of the room.
meanings.sent5: The diamond backscatters light in a dazzling display of colors.

meanings.definition: The act of reflecting or deflecting radiation or particles in a backward direction.
meanings.sent1: The backscatters from the mirror create interesting patterns on the ceiling.
meanings.sent2: Scientists study the backscatters to understand the behavior of particles.
meanings.sent3: The backscatters from the disco ball make the room feel magical.
meanings.sent4: His words were like backscatters, bouncing off without leaving an impact.
meanings.sent5: The backscatters of the fireworks lit up the night sky with bursts of color.
